dict.string: SUBQUERY ( extensionItems, $item, SUBQUERY ( $item.attachments, $att, ANY $att.registeredTypeIdentifiers UTI-CONFORMS-TO "public.url" || ANY $att.registeredTypeIdentifiers UTI-CONFORMS-TO "public.plain-text" || ANY $att.registeredTypeIdentifiers UTI-CONFORMS-TO "public.image" ).@count > 0 ).@count > 0
